text:
Electriq Power | Palo Alto, CA | https://electriqpower.com | Full-Time | ONSITE

Electriq Power builds an all-in-one energy storage solution for the home. We've partnered with a Fortune-50 company to competitively tackle the residential energy storage system market, and plan on a global product launch early-mid 2017.

We're hiring:

- Full Stack Software - Front End Software - Back End Software

Stack:

- Node.js, Angular.js, MongoDB, Linux/AWS, Nginx

Email travis@electriqpower.com for details.
